title: the Weapon of the Faithful

title: the Frost Archer
text:

title: the Dreadnought
text:

title: the Seneschal of Demacia

title: the Unforgiven
text: As a child, Yasuo often believed what the others in his village said of him: on the best days, his very existence was an error in judgement; on the worst, he was a mistake that could never be undone.

title: the Unforgotten

title: Rise of the Thorns
text:
Zyra’s memory is long, and runs as deep as the roots of the earth. Her kind was young when the Rune Wars raged, when mortal armies fought one another for the very keys of creation.
